title: Violent cartoon study children dependent variable

content.question: The dependent variable in the experiment is the

choices.label: amount of aggressive behavior exhibited by the children
amount of time that each child spent interacting with the other children
group in which each child was originally placed

content.answer: amount of aggressive behavior exhibited by the children
